exposuremode: Programmed AE, Shutter Priority AE, Aperture Priority AE, Manual exposure
focus: Single AF / Continuous AF (SR AUTO, Movie)
movierecording: 1280 x 720 pixels / 640 x 480 pixels / 320 x 240 pixels (30 frames / sec.) with monaural sound
focallength: f=5.0 – 90.0 mm, equivalent to 28 – 504mm on a 35 mm camera
shutterspeed: (Auto mode) 1/4 sec. to 1/2000 sec. , (All other modes) 8 sec. to 1/2000 sec. with mechanical shutter
aperturerange: F3.1 / F6.4(Wide), F5.6 / F11(Telephoto) with ND filter
lcdscreensize: 3.0-inch, approx. 230,000 dots, TFT color LCD monitor, approx. 97% coverage
